text:
Created attachment 34330
changes %JAVA_OPTS% to $JAVA_OPTS in bin/catalina.sh

The windows style variable %JAVA_OPTS% is used in bin/catalina.sh  instead of $JAVA_OPTS

Same patch can be applied to http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/tomcat/trunk , r1763634
creator: carl.berger@posteo.de
markt@apache.org
text:
Whoops. Thanks for catching that.

This has been fixed in the following branches:
- 9.0.x for 9.0.0.M11 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.6 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.38 onwards
